channel.title: Port forwarding!
channel.description:
Hello
Im having trouble port forwarding. here is what i did so far
i went to windows fire wall, added the port
downloaded no-ip
set up a no-ip account, for the ip part on there, i used the ip from whatismyip.com
i downloaded no-ip
smiley face turned happy
my modem/router is a
actiontec gt701wg
i went to http://192.168.0.1
it brought me to my control panel, I went to advanced port forwarding.
here is what it looked like.
[img]http://img138.imageshack.us/img138/5476/ipwe5.jpg[/img]
what do i put for the ip etc?...
I went to portforward.com and found my router, http://www.portforward.com/english/routers/port_forwarding/Actiontec/GT701WG/1st_SMTP_Server.htm
now on this guide, it says i must set up a Static IP Address in order to port forward, i tried but got confused. so is there anyway to skip this, and is this the reason why my server isnt working?
if anyone can answer any of these questions i would appreciate it. thanks!

item.title: Port forwarding!
item.dc:creator: @blue_kirby blue kirby
item.description:
@blue_kirby wrote:

Simple, you put 192.168.0.1 in that box

Read full topic

item.title: Port forwarding!
item.dc:creator: @runevault runevault
item.description:
@runevault wrote:

Hello

Im having trouble port forwarding.
here is what i did so far

i went to windows fire wall, added the port

downloaded no-ip

set up a no-ip account, for the ip part on there, i used the ip from whatismyip.com

i downloaded no-ip

smiley face turned happy

my modem/router is a

actiontec gt701wg

i went to http://192.168.0.1

it brought me to my control panel, I went to advanced port forwarding.

here is what it looked like.

what do i put for the ip etc?..

I went to portforward.com and found my router, http://www.portforward.com/english/routers/port_forwarding/Actiontec/GT701WG/1st_SMTP_Server.htm

now on this guide, it says i must set up a Static IP Address in order to port forward, i tried but got confused. so is there anyway to skip this, and is this the reason why my server isnt working?

if anyone can answer any of these questions i would appreciate it. thanks!
